official_title: To recognize contributions made by Federal civilian employees during the attack on Pearl Harbor and during World War II.

summary.text: Designates December 4, 1991, as Federal Civilian Employee Remembrance Day to recognize contributions provided by Federal civilian employees during the attack on Pearl Harbor and during World War II.
